title: I'm a paragon at League of Legends.
body: Yes I can display a bit of sovereignty about it, because it's true. I realize a lot of you are rather vituperative about it, but you need to get over it. You could just assume that I'm a slight meliorate and nothing will make me bad at this game that is so easy, effortless, rather facile. Of course in due time I will be in Challenger and at Worlds, carrying garbage teams like Team Solo Mid to victory. Most of you are discourteous of my perfect achievements. You're all to loutish to reach the impeccable talent that I possess. See you at Worlds, nerds.

replies.body:
TSM will bench TrashLift 5 u ggwpezglhfbglelkekkappa
